name: Ashi
description:
- Genre
2D Platform Game

- Story
Adventures of the naughty "Ashi" who accidentally crossed over to the Divine world.

"Asi" was playing tag with his friends in the mountains.

He is hiding in a wooden box that he came across. He blinks to sleep.

When he woke up, he found the first place he had seen.

He found his way home, and suddenly a scary ghost chased him from behind...

- Game Features

1. Using the power of the bead awakens the life of things around it.
Let's move through the map by interacting with the awakened lives.

2. Oriental Style Pixel Art

3. Level Design of High Difficulty
